name: Where's My Clothes
description:
WHERE'S MY CLOTHES?!

A man wakes up inside a Tetris Game and he's only in his Towel!
Collect the Ice Crystals to stop the LAVA from above!
Meanwhile, Play Tetris, but don't let the block squish you or reach the top!

SOUNDTRACK

https://soundcloud.com/keysaudio/wheres-my-clothes-original-soundtrack

CONTROLS

WASD movment
Space to Jump
Left and Right Arrows to Control Tetris Blocks
Up Arrow to Rotate Tetris Blocks
Down Arrow to Make Tetris Block Fall Faster
ESC for Controls

BEST PLAYED IN FULLSCREEN

OBJECTIVE
Collect Blue Ice to Push Lava Up
Survive as long as possible Gain as many points as possible

Dmitriy Karaush - Programming
Justin Chin - Game Design (out of context, lol)
Tyson McKenzie - Audio
Diana Moldovan - 3d Art
